sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Typography, Container, Box, Button, Link, Grid, AppBar, Toolbar } from '@mui/material';
import { styled } from '@mui/system';
import { Link as RouterLink } from 'react-router-dom';

const StyledButton = styled(Button)(({ theme }) => ({
  padding: '12px 28px',
  fontSize: '14px',
  fontWeight: 500,
  letterSpacing: '0.05em',
  borderRadius: '4px',
  transition: 'all 0.25s cubic-bezier(0.645, 0.045, 0.355, 1)',
  '&:hover': {
    transform: 'translateY(-3px)',
    boxShadow: '0 10px 20px -10px rgba(2, 12, 27, 0.7)',
  },
}));

const NavLink = styled(Button)(({ theme }) => ({
  color: theme.palette.text.primary,
  margin: theme.spacing(0, 1),
  '&:hover': {
    color: theme.palette.primary.main,
    backgroundColor: 'transparent',
  },
}));

const Home = () => {
  const skills = [
    'Java', 'Spring Boot', 'Microservices', 'Kafka', 'Redis',
    'Python', 'Golang', 'JavaScript', 'TypeScript', 'React', 'Node.js',
    'REST APIs', 'Docker', 'Kubernetes', 'CI/CD', 'AWS', 'Azure', 'AI Windsurf',
    'MySQL', 'MongoDB', 'PostgreSQL', 'Git', 'Linux'
  ];

  return (
    <>
      <AppBar position="fixed" color="transparent" elevation={0} sx={{ backdropFilter: 'blur(10px)' }}>
        <Toolbar sx={{ justifyContent: 'flex-end' }}>
          <NavLink component={RouterLink} to="/experience">
            Experience
          </NavLink>
          <NavLink component={RouterLink} to="/projects">
            Projects
          </NavLink>
          <Button 
            variant="outlined" 
            color="primary" 
            href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Mi9Kc6Q2BlTVJFVkfmrRIAF0JkeusZOW/view?usp=sharing" 
            target="_blank"
            rel="noopener noreferrer"
            sx={{ ml: 2 }}
          >
            Resume
          </Button>
        </Toolbar>
      </AppBar>
      <Container maxWidth="lg" sx={{ mt: { xs: 15, md: 25 }, mb: 10 }}>
      <Box sx={{ mb: 10 }}>
        <Typography variant="h6" color="primary" sx={{ mb: 2 }}>
          Hi, my name is
        </Typography>
        <Typography variant="h1" sx={{ mb: 2 }}>
          Anish Jain.
        </Typography>
        <Typography variant="h2" sx={{ mb: 3, color: '#8892b0' }}>
          I build things for the web.
        </Typography>
        <Typography variant="body1" sx={{ maxWidth: '540px', mb: 4 }}>
          I'm a backend engineer specializing in building (and occasionally designing) exceptional digital experiences. Currently, I'm focused on building accessible, human-centered products at <Link href="#" color="primary" underline="hover">Company</Link>.
        </Typography>
        
        <StyledButton 
          variant="contained" 
          color="primary"
          href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Mi9Kc6Q2BlTVJFVkfmrRIAF0JkeusZOW/view?usp=sharing" 
          target="_blank"
          rel="noopener noreferrer"
          sx={{ mr: 2, mb: 2 }}
        >
          Check out my resume!
        </StyledButton>
      </Box>

      <Box sx={{ mb: 15 }}>
        <Typography variant="h3" sx={{ mb: 4 }}>
          About Me
        </Typography>
        <Grid container spacing={4} alignItems="center">
          <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
            <Typography variant="body1" sx={{ mb: 3 }}>
              Hello! My name is Anish and I enjoy creating things that live on the internet. My interest in web development started back in 2012 when I decided to try editing custom Tumblr themes â€” turns out hacking together a custom reblog button taught me a lot about HTML & CSS!
            </Typography>
            <Typography variant="body1" sx={{ mb: 3 }}>
              Fast-forward to today, and I've had the privilege of working at <Link href="#" color="primary" underline="hover">an advertising agency</Link>, <Link href="#" color="primary" underline="hover">a start-up</Link>, <Link href="#" color="primary" underline="hover">a huge corporation</Link>, and <Link href="#" color="primary" underline="hover">a student-led design studio</Link>. My main focus these days is building accessible, inclusive products and digital experiences at <Link href="#" color="primary" underline="hover">Upstatement</Link> for a variety of clients.
            </Typography>
            <Typography variant="body1" sx={{ mb: 3 }}>
              I also recently <Link href="#" color="primary" underline="hover">launched a course</Link> that covers everything you need to build a web app with the Spotify API using Node & React.
            </Typography>
            <Typography variant="body1">
              Here are a few technologies I've been working with recently (including Azure and AI Windsurf):
            </Typography>
            <Grid container spacing={1} sx={{ mt: 1 }}>
              {skills.slice(0, 6).map((skill, i) => (
                <Grid item xs={6} key={i}>
                  <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center' }}>
                    <Box sx={{ width: '6px', height: '6px', bgcolor: 'primary.main', borderRadius: '50%', mr: 1 }} />
                    <Typography variant="body1" component="span">{skill}</Typography>
                  </Box>
                </Grid>
              ))}
            </Grid>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item xs={12} md={6} sx={{ textAlign: 'center' }}>
            <Box 
              component="div" 
              sx={{
                width: '300px',
                height: '300px',
                borderRadius: '4px',
                background: 'linear-gradient(45deg, #0a192f, #112240)',
                margin: '0 auto',
                position: 'relative',
                '&:after': {
                  content: '""',
                  position: 'absolute',
                  top: '20px',
                  left: '20px',
                  right: '-20px',
                  bottom: '-20px',
                  border: '2px solid #00a3e1',
                  borderRadius: '4px',
                  zIndex: -1,
                  transition: 'all 0.25s cubic-bezier(0.645, 0.045, 0.355, 1)'
                },
                '&:hover:after': {
                  top: '15px',
                  left: '15px'
                }
              }}
            >
              {/* Replace with your actual image */}
              <Box 
                component="div" 
                sx={{
                  width: '100%',
                  height: '100%',
                  background: 'linear-gradient(45deg, #0a192f, #112240)',
                  borderRadius: '4px',
                  display: 'flex',
                  alignItems: 'center',
                  justifyContent: 'center',
                  color: '#8892b0',
                  fontSize: '14px'
                }}
              >
                [Your Photo]
              </Box>
            </Box>
          </Grid>
        </Grid>
      </Box>

      <Box sx={{ mb: 15 }}>
        <Typography variant="h3" sx={{ mb: 4, textAlign: 'center' }}>
          Get In Touch
        </Typography>
        <Typography variant="body1" sx={{ maxWidth: '600px', mx: 'auto', textAlign: 'center', mb: 4 }}>
          I'm currently looking for new opportunities, my inbox is always open. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!
        </Typography>
        <Box sx={{ textAlign: 'center' }}>
          <StyledButton 
            variant="outlined" 
            color="primary"
            href="mailto:88anish.jain@gmail.com"
            sx={{ mt: 2 }}
          >
            Say Hello
          </StyledButton>
        </Box>
      </Box>

      <Box sx={{ textAlign: 'center' }}>
        <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
          Built with React & Material-UI
        </Typography>
      </Box>
      </Container>
    </>
  );
};

export default Home;
